<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="#a84b611106739b9bc347338219f73be29"><span class="doxyHighlight">static uint64&#95;t <a href="#a84b611106739b9bc347338219f73be29">getLocCookie</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smdiagnostic">SMDiagnostic</a> &amp;SMD, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sourcemgr">SourceMgr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f3f23062c5d5636bee27c54f4a407f0">SrcMgr</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the inline asm had metadata associated with it, pull out a location</span></CodeLine>
